name: Cops and Donuts! Don't block the lines
name_original: Cops and Donuts! Don't block the lines
description:
A delicious new and addictive Puzzle game.

Eat as many donuts as you can! Beat your best score! Call for backup when there are too much donuts! Collect all the cops!

You can play Cops and Donuts! on iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.

***** FEATURE LIST *****

+ playable on Apple Watch
+ Easy to play
+ Challenging to master
+ 18 cops to collect
+ 3 special Powers
+ Game Center leaderboard
